SELECT su.id, su.name, su.password, su.user_name, su.en_user_name, su.number_name, su.qq_number, su.sex, su.phone, su.cell_phone_number, su.nailing_number, su.wechat_number, su.email, su.is_depart_charge, su.depart_id, su.department_list, su.depart_ids, su.rel_tenant_ids, su.post_id, su.entry_time, su.job_status, su.STATUS, su.user_type, su.supervisor_id, su.part_time_dep_id, su.code, su.remark, su.is_deleted, su.create_by, su.create_time, su.update_by, su.update_time , GROUP_CONCAT( sur.role_id ) roleListIdString, (SELECT suu.name FROM sys_user suu where suu.id=su.supervisor_id) supervisor_id_name
FROM sys_user su left join sys_user_role sur on su.id=sur.user_id where su.is_deleted=0 and sur.is_deleted=0 and su.id=#{sysUser.id} group by su.name

SELECT su.id, su.name, su.password, su.user_name, su.en_user_name, su.number_name, su.qq_number, su.sex, su.phone, su.cell_phone_number, su.nailing_number, su.wechat_number, su.email, su.is_depart_charge, su.depart_id, su.department_list, su.depart_ids, su.rel_tenant_ids, su.post_id, su.entry_time, su.job_status, su.STATUS, su.user_type, su.supervisor_id, su.part_time_dep_id, su.code, su.remark, su.is_deleted, su.create_by, su.create_time, su.update_by, su.update_time FROM sys_user su where su.is_deleted=0 and su.name=#{token}

SELECT DISTINCT su.id ids, su.* FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id AND sur.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = sur.role_id AND sr.is_deleted = 0 WHERE su.is_deleted = 0 AND sr.role_code = #{roleCode} and su.code = #{tenantCode}
